title: game won't load
body:
Ok, players and riot I need help!
I use a mac to play lol, but since the past day or so every time I want to play a game everything runs smoothly, until I get to the loading screen after champion select. Every time I will see a black screen and my mouse which I am not able to move. Before this problem started 1 or 2 days ago I was able to play lol perfectly fine, so I have no clue what happened, because I didn't press any button in order to cause this. Sadly for some reason this happens every time and I have no idea how to fix it... I currently have a week of vacation and would love to spend it playing lol :(

replies.body:
Hey Fearleskiller256,

Give Riot's Connection KB a try and see if that fixes your issues up. I tried it when I was having the same issues and it fixed it right up :) 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
